doctor.description: Run diagnostic checks for TPMJS CLI

tool.description: Start with a specific tool selected
tool.name: tool

run.description: Execute a tool from a collection via MCP

examples.description: First, list all tools in a collection
Execute Python code in the unsandbox collection
Pass environment variables for tool authentication
examples.command: <%= config.bin %> run -c ajax/unsandbox -t unsandbox--execute -e UNSANDBOX_PUBLIC_KEY=xxx -e UNSANDBOX_SECRET_KEY=xxx --args '{"language":"python","code":"print(1)"}'

update.description: Update the TPMJS CLI to the latest version

check.description: Only check for updates, do not install
check.name: check

api-key.description: API key (or set TPMJS_API_KEY environment variable)
api-key.name: api-key

provider.description: AI provider (ANTHROPIC, OPENAI, GOOGLE, GROQ, MISTRAL)
provider.name: provider

examples: <%= config.bin %> <%= command.id %> my-collection tool-id-1 tool-id-2 tool-id-3
<%= config.bin %> <%= command.id %> --name "Web Scrapers" --description "Tools for web scraping" --public

collection:import.description: Import tools to a collection from a file

file.description: File containing tool IDs (one per line or JSON array)
file.name: file

collection:info.description: Show collection details and list all available tools

collection:remove.description: Remove a tool from a collection

mcp:config.description: Generate MCP configuration for AI clients

output.description: Output file path (will merge with existing config)
output.name: output

api-key.description: API key to include in config (optional)
api-key.name: api-key

mcp:serve.description: Run as a local MCP server

port.description: Port to run the server on (HTTP mode)
port.name: port

stdio.description: Use stdio transport instead of HTTP
stdio.name: stdio

collection.description: Serve tools from a specific collection
collection.name: collection

package.description: npm package name (defaults to current directory)
package.name: package

publish:check.description: Check if your package has been discovered by tpmjs.com

publish:preview.description: Preview how your tool will appear on tpmjs.com

scenario:generate.description: Generate AI-powered scenarios for a collection

skip-similarity-check.description: Skip checking for similar existing scenarios
skip-similarity-check.name: skip-similarity-check

scenario:info.description: Show detailed information about a scenario

runs.description: Number of recent runs to show
runs.name: runs

collection.description: Collection ID or slug (optional - shows all public scenarios if omitted)
collection.name: collection

scenario:list.description: List scenarios for a collection or all public scenarios

scenario:run.description: Run all scenarios for a collection

limit.description: Maximum number of scenarios to run
limit.name: limit

scenario:test.description: Run a single scenario by ID

verbose.description: Show verbose output including full reason
verbose.name: verbose

input-file.description: Path to JSON file containing input parameters
input-file.name: input-file

stream.description: Stream output (for tools that support it)
stream.name: stream

tool:info.description: Get detailed information about a tool

name.description: Tool name (creates directory if not exists)
name.name: name

tool:init.description: Initialize a new TPMJS tool package

tool:search.description: Search for tools in the TPMJS registry

path.description: Path to package directory (defaults to current directory)
path.name: path
